name: USDa
description: Avalon Labs is creating an on-chain financial center for Bitcoin, offering BTC-backed lending, a Bitcoin-backed stablecoin, yield accounts, and a credit card. The goal is to make Bitcoin an active economic asset in global markets through a scalable and accessible network. USDa is the flagship CDP (Collateralized Debt Position) product based on Avalon's CeDeFi lending platform. The goal of USDa is to provide the best stablecoin solution for DeFi community with extremely high capital efficiency, stability and deep liquidity from BTC community.
